Posts.Content: Dec 29, 2010 04:16AM xiaoni wrote: from the moment I had my portocath inserted, I have planned to tattoo over that scar with a phrase of "Perseverance" in Chinese characters, since I was performing in a Chinese Opera during my chemo treatment (very difficult btw!). I had my last Herceptin treatment yesterday and will have my port removed on Jan 6. I was hoping to get the tattoo ASAP but researching online has made me think that I have to wait a year. the original scar is 13 months old and healed nice & flat but Doctor will have to rip it open again to remove the port.
